This crewneck is so adorable! It's overeized and the colors are perfect, I had just bought some jean marc fisher pumps and this goes so cute with them! It's quality is wonderful, washed it and it's still the same! It's worth the cost! I recommend!!

I got the star sweater and I love it! It was accurate to the picture and is super cute! The only thing I’d say is I bought the recommended size which for me was a medium. I am around 125-130 pounds and am 5,1. The shirt fits perfectly but is too long, the length reaching down to my knees. I had my mom alter it to be shorter and I love it. Would recommend because of good quality and accurate to photo but just to take into consideration is how long the sweater is.
